description: This fictional film tells the tale of Striker Bucknell who throws a party which, if it succeeds, will be his passport to "hell." The unexpected arrival of Abel and Garth, of the Children of Heaven religious group, disrupts his well-laid plans to win membership in the motorcycle gang, the Sons of Satan.
